Tesla’s actuator team designs and builds actuators for humanoid bi-pedal robots (Tesla Bot). The Optimus team joins mechanical, electrical, and electromagnetic engineering disciplines in a highly collaborative environment. This position will focus on mechanical assembly and is critical to the development of the high-performance electromechanical rotary and linear actuator systems for the Tesla Bot.
As part of the design team you will prototype actuators, including winding of motors, assembly of gearboxes, torque/speed sensor installation. You will also be responsible for failure analysis and improvement suggestions.
SpaceX has built and shipped its 200th Falcon second stage, highlighting the often underappreciated rocket’s record of achievement on the ground and in flight.
